content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have the required ingredients to smelt before inserting items. Check the inventory of the furnaces to confirm they are not empty.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities occupying the intended tile.
